overview: Intrepid director JD lurks in the Brazilian underground, seeking to expose gorgeous, sexually adventurous TS talent. In 'Transgressive 6,' he captures hardcore scenes in three flavors: Two T-girls perform tempting solo masturbation demonstrations; two transsexual beauties show how to seduce a heavily hung man; and two more fabulous ladies share a TS-on-TS tryst!
title: Transgressive 6
